comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
The update to .NET 5 RC.1 was already done, using the .NET SDK version `5.0.100-rc.1.20452.10`, which is what .NET team publicly released: https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet/5.0
Microsoft
Download .NET 5.0 (Linux, macOS, and Windows)
.NET 5.0 downloads for Linux, macOS, and Windows. .NET is a free, cross-platform, open-source developer platform for building many different types of applications.
